name: Modern Ludo
description:
Unlike traditional Ludo (Aeroplane / Flying Chess), Modern Ludo modifies the game rule to make its suitable of mobile device and more excited. And also it provides ultimate graphical effect, makes Ludo game more funny.

Use your bullet to destroy all enemies! Watch out! Don't flow (6) 3 times.

Game rule:
1. Flow the dice to decide the play sequence
2. Flow even number to arise your airplane, such number 2 rise 1 airplane, number 4 rise 2 airplanes, and number 6 rise 3 airplanes.
3. Each time only allow to move 1 airplane.
4. When airplane moves to same color, you can jump.
5. When airplane moves to the fly path with same color, it can fly.
6. When airplane moves to a square, but this square have an enemy airplanes. It will intercept enemy and destroy enemy airplane.
7. Airplane can intercept any number of enemy airplanes. So you can use one airplane to destroy up to 4 enemy airplanes.
8. All of be intercepted airplanes will go back to airport.
9. When 4 airplanes arrive center, he will win the game.
10. When player flowed number 6, the player will obtain one bonus turn. But when he flows number 6 three times, all of his airplanes will be destroyed and go back to airport.

*** Our new Ludo game ***
Ludo 3D : A Unique Real Flying Chess / Aeroplane Chess
